title.native: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった
title.romaji: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Motokano datta
title.english: My Stepmom's Daughter is My Ex

description:
Ah, high school. Is there any better place to start fresh after a horrible middle school relationship? Nope! Not unless your ex ends up at the same school as you and is now your stepsibling. What was supposed to be a sanctuary of peace where I could avoid ever seeing her again has become a living nightmare! Everywhere I look, I see her—in my house, in my school, in my class. There's no escape! She even claims that she’s the older sibling. Like hell she is! But I won't lose to her. After all, I'm the older brother in this new family situation. That’s right, we’re family now. No matter how much we may have thought we loved each other before, we saw one another’s true colors and realized we weren’t meant for each other. That’s why even though we may keep up a buddy-buddy sibling act for the sake of our parents, things will never go back to the way they used to be.

(Source: J-Novel Club)
synonyms: เอาแล้วไง ยัยแฟนเก่าดันเป็นลูกสาวแม่ใหม่

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Inseki
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations among step, adopted, and other non-blood related family members.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Feet
tags.description: Features the sexual depiction or stimulation of a character's feet.

title.native: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Website](https://dialogue-music.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DIALOGUE_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/dialogue_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/DIALOGUEOfficialChannel) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@dialogue_official)

DIALOGUE+ is a voice actress unit composed of the following members:

- [Yurina Uchiyama](https://anilist.co/staff/204404/Yurina-Uchiyama)
- [Nene Hieda](https://anilist.co/staff/163903/Nene-Hieda)
- [Kyouka Moriya](https://anilist.co/staff/164774/Kyouka-Moriya)
- [Yuuna Ogata](https://anilist.co/staff/190470/Yuuna-Ogata)
- [Ayaka Takamura](https://anilist.co/staff/204409/Ayaka-Takamura)
- [Satsuki Miyahara](https://anilist.co/staff/204411/Satsuki-Miyahara)
- [Mayu Iizuka](https://anilist.co/staff/166401/Mayu-Iizuka)
- [Manatsu Murakami](https://anilist.co/staff/204420/Manatsu-Murakami)

Hiromi Mizutani is a composer and arranger from Nagoya, Japan.  In addition to Zill O'll -infinite- and Yuusha 30, Hiromi Mizutani also composed music for the game Red Seeds Profile, known as Deadly Premonition outside of Japan.  He is a member of Team-MAX along with Yasuharu Takanashi, Kenji Fujisawa, Hiroshi Motofuji, Shuji Katayama and REMI.

A Japanese duo consisting of two female voice actors, [Haruki Iwata](https://anilist.co/staff/126658/Haruki-Iwata) and [Moeka Koizumi](https://anilist.co/staff/126657/Moeka-Koizumi), who appear in popular stage plays, anime and mobile games. harmoe is a new project that recreates the world of fairy tales on stage by way of easy-listening dance pop music for the whole world to enjoy. Their debut single, “Kimagure Ticktack”, was released in March 2021.

[Website](https://harmoe.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/harmoe_official)
